145 // durations
146 
147 using days = std::chrono::duration<
148  int, std::ratio_multiply<std::ratio<24>, std::chrono::hours::period>>;
149 
150 using weeks =
151  std::chrono::duration<int, std::ratio_multiply<std::ratio<7>, days::period>>;
152 
153 using years =
154  std::chrono::duration<int,
155  std::ratio_multiply<std::ratio<146097, 400>, days::period>>;
156 
157 using months =
158  std::chrono::duration<int, std::ratio_divide<years::period, std::ratio<12>>>;
159 
160 // time_point
161 
162 template <class Duration>
163 using sys_time = std::chrono::time_point<std::chrono::system_clock, Duration>;
164 
165 using sys_days = sys_time<days>;
166 using sys_seconds = sys_time<std::chrono::seconds>;
167 
168 struct local_t {};
169 
170 template <class Duration>
171 using local_time = std::chrono::time_point<local_t, Duration>;
172 
173 using local_seconds = local_time<std::chrono::seconds>;
174 using local_days = local_time<days>;

939 template <class CharT, class Traits = std::char_traits<CharT>>
940 class save_istream {
941  protected:
942  std::basic_ios<CharT, Traits>& is_;
943  CharT fill_;
944  std::ios::fmtflags flags_;
945  std::streamsize width_;
946  std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>* tie_;
947  std::locale loc_;
948 
949  public:
950  ~save_istream() {
951  is_.fill(fill_);
952  is_.flags(flags_);
953  is_.width(width_);
954  is_.imbue(loc_);
955  is_.tie(tie_);
956  }
957 
958  save_istream(const save_istream&) = delete;
959  save_istream& operator=(const save_istream&) = delete;
960 
961  explicit save_istream(std::basic_ios<CharT, Traits>& is)
962  : is_(is),
963  fill_(is.fill()),
964  flags_(is.flags()),
965  width_(is.width(0)),
966  tie_(is.tie(nullptr)),
967  loc_(is.getloc()) {
968  if (tie_ != nullptr) tie_->flush();
969  }
970 };
971 
972 template <class CharT, class Traits = std::char_traits<CharT>>
973 class save_ostream : private save_istream<CharT, Traits> {
974  public:
975  ~save_ostream() {
976  if ((this->flags_ & std::ios::unitbuf) &&
977 #if __cplusplus >= 201703
978  std::uncaught_exceptions() == 0 &&
979 #else
980  !std::uncaught_exception() &&
981 #endif
982  this->is_.good())
983  this->is_.rdbuf()->pubsync();
984  }
985 
986  save_ostream(const save_ostream&) = delete;
987  save_ostream& operator=(const save_ostream&) = delete;
988 
989  explicit save_ostream(std::basic_ios<CharT, Traits>& os)
990  : save_istream<CharT, Traits>(os) {}
991 };
992 
993 template <class T>
994 struct choose_trunc_type {
995  static const int digits = std::numeric_limits<T>::digits;
996  using type = typename std::conditional < digits < 32, std::int32_t,
997  typename std::conditional<digits<64, std::int64_t,
998 #ifdef __SIZEOF_INT128__
999  __int128
1000 #else
1001  std::int64_t
1002 #endif
1003  >::type>::type;
1004 };
1005 
1006 template <class T>
1007 CONSTCD11 inline
1008  typename std::enable_if<!std::chrono::treat_as_floating_point<T>::value, T>::type
1009  trunc(T t) NOEXCEPT {
1010  return t;
1011 }
1012 
1013 template <class T>
1014 CONSTCD14 inline
1015  typename std::enable_if<std::chrono::treat_as_floating_point<T>::value, T>::type
1016  trunc(T t) NOEXCEPT {
1017  using std::numeric_limits;
1018  using I = typename choose_trunc_type<T>::type;
1019  CONSTDATA auto digits = numeric_limits<T>::digits;
1020  static_assert(digits < numeric_limits<I>::digits, "");
1021  CONSTDATA auto max = I{1} << (digits - 1);
1022  CONSTDATA auto min = -max;
1023  const auto negative = t < T{0};
1024  if (min <= t && t <= max && t != 0 && t == t) {
1025  t = static_cast<T>(static_cast<I>(t));
1026  if (t == 0 && negative) t = -t;
1027  }
1028  return t;
1029 }
1030 
1031 template <std::intmax_t Xp, std::intmax_t Yp>
1032 struct static_gcd {
1033  static const std::intmax_t value = static_gcd<Yp, Xp % Yp>::value;
1034 };
1035 
1036 template <std::intmax_t Xp>
1037 struct static_gcd<Xp, 0> {
1038  static const std::intmax_t value = Xp;
1039 };
1040 
1041 template <>
1042 struct static_gcd<0, 0> {
1043  static const std::intmax_t value = 1;
1044 };
1045 
1046 template <class R1, class R2>
1047 struct no_overflow {
1048  private:
1049  static const std::intmax_t gcd_n1_n2 = static_gcd<R1::num, R2::num>::value;
1050  static const std::intmax_t gcd_d1_d2 = static_gcd<R1::den, R2::den>::value;
1051  static const std::intmax_t n1 = R1::num / gcd_n1_n2;
1052  static const std::intmax_t d1 = R1::den / gcd_d1_d2;
1053  static const std::intmax_t n2 = R2::num / gcd_n1_n2;
1054  static const std::intmax_t d2 = R2::den / gcd_d1_d2;
1055  static const std::intmax_t max =
1056  -((std::intmax_t(1) << (sizeof(std::intmax_t) * CHAR_BIT - 1)) + 1);
1057 
1058  template <std::intmax_t Xp, std::intmax_t Yp, bool overflow>
1059  struct mul { // overflow == false
1060  static const std::intmax_t value = Xp * Yp;
1061  };
1062 
1063  template <std::intmax_t Xp, std::intmax_t Yp>
1064  struct mul<Xp, Yp, true> {
1065  static const std::intmax_t value = 1;
1066  };
1067 
1068  public:
1069  static const bool value = (n1 <= max / d2) && (n2 <= max / d1);
1070  typedef std::ratio<mul<n1, d2, !value>::value, mul<n2, d1, !value>::value> type;
1071 };
1072 
1073 } // namespace detail
1074 
1075 // trunc towards zero
1076 template <class To, class Rep, class Period>
1077 CONSTCD11 inline
1078  typename std::enable_if<detail::no_overflow<Period, typename To::period>::value,
1079  To>::type
1080  trunc(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>& d) {
1081  return To{detail::trunc(std::chrono::duration_cast<To>(d).count())};
1082 }
1083 
1084 template <class To, class Rep, class Period>
1085 CONSTCD11 inline
1086  typename std::enable_if<!detail::no_overflow<Period, typename To::period>::value,
1087  To>::type
1088  trunc(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>& d) {
1089  using std::chrono::duration;
1090  using std::chrono::duration_cast;
1091  using rep = typename std::common_type<Rep, typename To::rep>::type;
1092  return To{detail::trunc(duration_cast<To>(duration_cast<duration<rep>>(d)).count())};
1093 }

1095 #ifndef HAS_CHRONO_ROUNDING
1096 #if defined(_MSC_FULL_VER) && \
1097  (_MSC_FULL_VER >= 190023918 || (_MSC_FULL_VER >= 190000000 && defined(__clang__)))
1098 #define HAS_CHRONO_ROUNDING 1
1099 #elif defined(__cpp_lib_chrono) && __cplusplus > 201402 && __cpp_lib_chrono >= 201510
1100 #define HAS_CHRONO_ROUNDING 1
1101 #elif defined(_LIBCPP_VERSION) && __cplusplus > 201402 && _LIBCPP_VERSION >= 3800
1102 #define HAS_CHRONO_ROUNDING 1
1103 #else
1104 #define HAS_CHRONO_ROUNDING 0
1105 #endif
1106 #endif // HAS_CHRONO_ROUNDING
1107 
1108 #if HAS_CHRONO_ROUNDING == 0
1109 
1110 // round down
1111 template <class To, class Rep, class Period>
1112 CONSTCD14 inline
1113  typename std::enable_if<detail::no_overflow<Period, typename To::period>::value,
1114  To>::type
1115  floor(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>& d) {
1116  auto t = trunc<To>(d);
1117  if (t > d) return t - To{1};
1118  return t;
1119 }
1120 
1121 template <class To, class Rep, class Period>
1122 CONSTCD14 inline
1123  typename std::enable_if<!detail::no_overflow<Period, typename To::period>::value,
1124  To>::type
1125  floor(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>& d) {
1126  using std::chrono::duration;
1127  using rep = typename std::common_type<Rep, typename To::rep>::type;
1128  return floor<To>(floor<duration<rep>>(d));
1129 }
1130 
1131 // round to nearest, to even on tie
1132 template <class To, class Rep, class Period>
1133 CONSTCD14 inline To round(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>& d) {
1134  auto t0 = floor<To>(d);
1135  auto t1 = t0 + To{1};
1136  if (t1 == To{0} && t0 < To{0}) t1 = -t1;
1137  auto diff0 = d - t0;
1138  auto diff1 = t1 - d;
1139  if (diff0 == diff1) {
1140  if (t0 - trunc<To>(t0 / 2) * 2 == To{0}) return t0;
1141  return t1;
1142  }
1143  if (diff0 < diff1) return t0;
1144  return t1;
1145 }
1146 
1147 // round up
1148 template <class To, class Rep, class Period>
1149 CONSTCD14 inline To ceil(const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>& d) {
1150  auto t = trunc<To>(d);
1151  if (t < d) return t + To{1};
1152  return t;
1153 }
1154 
1155 template <class Rep, class Period,
1156  class = typename std::enable_if<std::numeric_limits<Rep>::is_signed>::type>
1157 CONSTCD11 std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> abs(std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> d) {
1158  return d >= d.zero() ? d : -d;
1159 }
1160 
1161 // round down
1162 template <class To, class Clock, class FromDuration>
1163 CONSTCD11 inline std::chrono::time_point<Clock, To> floor(
1164  const std::chrono::time_point<Clock, FromDuration>& tp) {
1165  using std::chrono::time_point;
1166  return time_point<Clock, To>{date::floor<To>(tp.time_since_epoch())};
1167 }
1168 
1169 // round to nearest, to even on tie
1170 template <class To, class Clock, class FromDuration>
1171 CONSTCD11 inline std::chrono::time_point<Clock, To> round(
1172  const std::chrono::time_point<Clock, FromDuration>& tp) {
1173  using std::chrono::time_point;
1174  return time_point<Clock, To>{round<To>(tp.time_since_epoch())};
1175 }

1179 CONSTCD11 inline std::chrono::time_point<Clock, To> ceil(
1180  const std::chrono::time_point<Clock, FromDuration>& tp) {
1181  using std::chrono::time_point;
1182  return time_point<Clock, To>{ceil<To>(tp.time_since_epoch())};
1183 }
1184

1775 CONSTCD14 inline year_month operator+(const year_month& ym, const months& dm) NOEXCEPT {
1776  auto dmi = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned>(ym.month())) - 1 + dm.count();
1777  auto dy = (dmi >= 0 ? dmi : dmi - 11) / 12;
1778  dmi = dmi - dy * 12 + 1;
1779  return (ym.year() + years(dy)) / month(static_cast<unsigned>(dmi));
1780 }

1785 }

1789  return ym + -dm;
1790 }

1795  months(static_cast<unsigned>(x.month()) - static_cast<unsigned>(y.month()));
1796 }

2175 CONSTCD14
2176 inline days year_month_day::to_days() const NOEXCEPT {
2177  static_assert(std::numeric_limits<unsigned>::digits >= 18,
2178  "This algorithm has not been ported to a 16 bit unsigned integer");
2179  static_assert(std::numeric_limits<int>::digits >= 20,
2180  "This algorithm has not been ported to a 16 bit signed integer");
2181  auto const y = static_cast<int>(y_) - (m_ <= February);
2182  auto const m = static_cast<unsigned>(m_);
2183  auto const d = static_cast<unsigned>(d_);
2184  auto const era = (y >= 0 ? y : y - 399) / 400;
2185  auto const yoe = static_cast<unsigned>(y - era * 400); // [0, 399]
2186  auto const doy = (153 * (m > 2 ? m - 3 : m + 9) + 2) / 5 + d - 1; // [0, 365]
2187  auto const doe = yoe * 365 + yoe / 4 - yoe / 100 + doy; // [0, 146096]
2188  return days{era * 146097 + static_cast<int>(doe) - 719468};
2189 }

2191 CONSTCD14
2192 inline year_month_day::operator sys_days() const NOEXCEPT { return sys_days{to_days()}; }
2193 
2194 CONSTCD14
2195 inline year_month_day::operator local_days() const NOEXCEPT {
2196  return local_days{to_days()};
2197 }

2199 CONSTCD14
2200 inline bool year_month_day::ok() const NOEXCEPT {
2201  if (!(y_.ok() && m_.ok())) return false;
2202  return date::day{1} <= d_ && d_ <= (y_ / m_ / last).day();
2203 }

2217  return x.year() < y.year()
2218  ? true
2219  : (x.year() > y.year()
2220  ? false
2221  : (x.month() < y.month()
2222  ? true
2223  : (x.month() > y.month() ? false : (x.day() < y.day()))));

2241 template <class CharT, class Traits>
2242 inline std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& operator<<(
2243  std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& os, const year_month_day& ymd) {
2244  detail::save_ostream<CharT, Traits> _(os);
2245  os.fill('0');
2246  os.flags(std::ios::dec | std::ios::right);
2247  os << ymd.year() << '-';
2248  os.width(2);
2249  os << static_cast<unsigned>(ymd.month()) << '-';
2250  os << ymd.day();
2251  if (!ymd.ok()) os << " is not a valid date";
2252  return os;

2254 
2255 CONSTCD14
2256 inline year_month_day year_month_day::from_days(days dp) NOEXCEPT {
2257  static_assert(std::numeric_limits<unsigned>::digits >= 18,
2258  "This algorithm has not been ported to a 16 bit unsigned integer");
2259  static_assert(std::numeric_limits<int>::digits >= 20,
2260  "This algorithm has not been ported to a 16 bit signed integer");
2261  auto const z = dp.count() + 719468;
2262  auto const era = (z >= 0 ? z : z - 146096) / 146097;
2263  auto const doe = static_cast<unsigned>(z - era * 146097); // [0, 146096]
2264  auto const yoe = (doe - doe / 1460 + doe / 36524 - doe / 146096) / 365; // [0, 399]
2265  auto const y = static_cast<days::rep>(yoe) + era * 400;
2266  auto const doy = doe - (365 * yoe + yoe / 4 - yoe / 100); // [0, 365]
2267  auto const mp = (5 * doy + 2) / 153; // [0, 11]
2268  auto const d = doy - (153 * mp + 2) / 5 + 1; // [1, 31]
2269  auto const m = mp < 10 ? mp + 3 : mp - 9; // [1, 12]
2270  return year_month_day{date::year{y + (m <= 2)}, date::month(m), date::day(d)};
2271 }

2276  return (ymd.year() / ymd.month() + dm) / ymd.day();
2277 }

2373 CONSTCD14
2374 inline bool year_month_weekday::ok() const NOEXCEPT {
2375  if (!y_.ok() || !m_.ok() || !wdi_.weekday().ok() || wdi_.index() < 1) return false;
2376  if (wdi_.index() <= 4) return true;
2377  auto d2 = wdi_.weekday() - date::weekday(static_cast<sys_days>(y_ / m_ / 1)) +
2378  days((wdi_.index() - 1) * 7 + 1);
2379  return static_cast<unsigned>(d2.count()) <=
2380  static_cast<unsigned>((y_ / m_ / last).day());
2381 }
2382 
2383 CONSTCD14
2384 inline year_month_weekday year_month_weekday::from_days(days d) NOEXCEPT {
2385  sys_days dp{d};
2386  auto const wd = date::weekday(dp);
2387  auto const ymd = year_month_day(dp);
2388  return {ymd.year(), ymd.month(), wd[(static_cast<unsigned>(ymd.day()) - 1) / 7 + 1]};
2389 }
2390 
2391 CONSTCD14
2392 inline days year_month_weekday::to_days() const NOEXCEPT {
2393  auto d = sys_days(y_ / m_ / 1);
2394  return (d + (wdi_.weekday() - date::weekday(d) + days{(wdi_.index() - 1) * 7}))
2395  .time_since_epoch();
2396 }

2805 enum { am = 1, pm };
2806 
2807 namespace detail {
2808 
2809 // width<n>::value is the number of fractional decimal digits in 1/n
2810 // width<0>::value and width<1>::value are defined to be 0
2811 // If 1/n takes more than 18 fractional decimal digits,
2812 // the result is truncated to 19.
2813 // Example: width<2>::value == 1
2814 // Example: width<3>::value == 19
2815 // Example: width<4>::value == 2
2816 // Example: width<10>::value == 1
2817 // Example: width<1000>::value == 3
2818 template <std::uint64_t n, std::uint64_t d = 10, unsigned w = 0,
2819  bool should_continue = !(n < 2) && d != 0 && (w < 19)>
2820 struct width {
2821  static CONSTDATA unsigned value = 1 + width<n, d % n * 10, w + 1>::value;
2822 };
2823 
2824 template <std::uint64_t n, std::uint64_t d, unsigned w>
2825 struct width<n, d, w, false> {
2826  static CONSTDATA unsigned value = 0;
2827 };
2828 
2829 template <unsigned exp>
2830 struct static_pow10 {
2831  private:
2832  static CONSTDATA std::uint64_t h = static_pow10<exp / 2>::value;
2833 
2834  public:
2835  static CONSTDATA std::uint64_t value = h * h * (exp % 2 ? 10 : 1);
2836 };
2837 
2838 template <>
2839 struct static_pow10<0> {
2840  static CONSTDATA std::uint64_t value = 1;
2841 };
2842 
2843 template <class Rep, unsigned w, bool in_range = (w < 19)>
2844 struct make_precision {
2845  using type = std::chrono::duration<Rep, std::ratio<1, static_pow10<w>::value>>;
2846  static CONSTDATA unsigned width = w;
2847 };
2848 
2849 template <class Rep, unsigned w>
2850 struct make_precision<Rep, w, false> {
2851  using type = std::chrono::duration<Rep, std::micro>;
2852  static CONSTDATA unsigned width = 6;
2853 };
2854 
2855 template <class Duration, unsigned w = width<std::common_type<
2856  Duration, std::chrono::seconds>::type::period::den>::value>
2857 class decimal_format_seconds {
2858  public:
2859  using rep = typename std::common_type<Duration, std::chrono::seconds>::type::rep;
2860  using precision = typename make_precision<rep, w>::type;
2861  static auto CONSTDATA width = make_precision<rep, w>::width;
2862 
2863  private:
2864  std::chrono::seconds s_;
2865  precision sub_s_;
2866 
2867  public:
2868  CONSTCD11 decimal_format_seconds() : s_(), sub_s_() {}
2869 
2870  CONSTCD11 explicit decimal_format_seconds(const Duration& d) NOEXCEPT
2871  : s_(std::chrono::duration_cast<std::chrono::seconds>(d)),
2872  sub_s_(std::chrono::duration_cast<precision>(d - s_)) {}
2873 
2874  CONSTCD14 std::chrono::seconds& seconds() NOEXCEPT { return s_; }
2875  CONSTCD11 std::chrono::seconds seconds() const NOEXCEPT { return s_; }
2876  CONSTCD11 precision subseconds() const NOEXCEPT { return sub_s_; }
2877 
2878  CONSTCD14 precision to_duration() const NOEXCEPT { return s_ + sub_s_; }
2879 
2880  CONSTCD11 bool in_conventional_range() const NOEXCEPT {
2881  return sub_s_ < std::chrono::seconds{1} && s_ < std::chrono::minutes{1};
2882  }
2883 
2884  template <class CharT, class Traits>
2885  friend std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& operator<<(
2886  std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& os, const decimal_format_seconds& x) {
2887  date::detail::save_ostream<CharT, Traits> _(os);
2888  os.fill('0');
2889  os.flags(std::ios::dec | std::ios::right);
2890  os.width(2);
2891  os << x.s_.count()
2892  << std::use_facet<std::numpunct<char>>(os.getloc()).decimal_point();
2893  os.width(width);
2894  os << static_cast<std::int64_t>(x.sub_s_.count());
2895  return os;
2896  }
2897 };
2898 
2899 template <class Duration>
2900 class decimal_format_seconds<Duration, 0> {
2901  static CONSTDATA unsigned w = 0;
2902 
2903  public:
2904  using rep = typename std::common_type<Duration, std::chrono::seconds>::type::rep;
2905  using precision = std::chrono::duration<rep>;
2906  static auto CONSTDATA width = make_precision<rep, w>::width;
2907 
2908  private:
2909  std::chrono::seconds s_;
2910 
2911  public:
2912  CONSTCD11 decimal_format_seconds() : s_() {}
2913  CONSTCD11 explicit decimal_format_seconds(const precision& s) NOEXCEPT : s_(s) {}
2914 
2915  CONSTCD14 std::chrono::seconds& seconds() NOEXCEPT { return s_; }
2916  CONSTCD11 std::chrono::seconds seconds() const NOEXCEPT { return s_; }
2917  CONSTCD14 precision to_duration() const NOEXCEPT { return s_; }
2918 
2919  CONSTCD11 bool in_conventional_range() const NOEXCEPT {
2920  return s_ < std::chrono::minutes{1};
2921  }
2922 
2923  template <class CharT, class Traits>
2924  friend std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& operator<<(
2925  std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& os, const decimal_format_seconds& x) {
2926  date::detail::save_ostream<CharT, Traits> _(os);
2927  os.fill('0');
2928  os.flags(std::ios::dec | std::ios::right);
2929  os.width(2);
2930  os << x.s_.count();
2931  return os;
2932  }
2933 };

2935 enum class classify { not_valid, hour, minute, second, subsecond };
2936 
2937 template <class Duration>
2938 struct classify_duration {
2939  static CONSTDATA classify value =
2940  std::is_convertible<Duration, std::chrono::hours>::value
2941  ? classify::hour
2942  : std::is_convertible<Duration, std::chrono::minutes>::value
2943  ? classify::minute
2944  : std::is_convertible<Duration, std::chrono::seconds>::value
2945  ? classify::second
2946  : std::chrono::treat_as_floating_point<
2947  typename Duration::rep>::value
2948  ? classify::not_valid
2949  : classify::subsecond;
2950 };

2952 template <class Rep, class Period>
2953 inline CONSTCD11 typename std::enable_if<std::numeric_limits<Rep>::is_signed,
2954  std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>>::type
2955 abs(std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> d) {
2956  return d >= d.zero() ? +d : -d;
2957 }
2958 
2959 template <class Rep, class Period>
2960 inline CONSTCD11 typename std::enable_if<!std::numeric_limits<Rep>::is_signed,
2961  std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>>::type
2962 abs(std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period> d) {
2963  return d;
2964 }

2966 class time_of_day_base {
2967  protected:
2968  std::chrono::hours h_;
2969  unsigned char mode_;
2970  bool neg_;
2971 
2972  enum { is24hr };
2973 
2974  CONSTCD11 time_of_day_base() NOEXCEPT : h_(0),
2975  mode_(static_cast<decltype(mode_)>(is24hr)),
2976  neg_(false) {}
2977 
2978  CONSTCD11 time_of_day_base(std::chrono::hours h, bool neg, unsigned m) NOEXCEPT
2979  : h_(detail::abs(h)),
2980  mode_(static_cast<decltype(mode_)>(m)),
2981  neg_(neg) {}
2982 
2983  CONSTCD14 void make24() NOEXCEPT;
2984  CONSTCD14 void make12() NOEXCEPT;
2985 
2986  CONSTCD14 std::chrono::hours to24hr() const;
2987 
2988  CONSTCD11 bool in_conventional_range() const NOEXCEPT { return !neg_ && h_ < days{1}; }
2989 };
2990 
2991 CONSTCD14
2992 inline std::chrono::hours time_of_day_base::to24hr() const {
2993  auto h = h_;
2994  if (mode_ == am || mode_ == pm) {
2995  CONSTDATA auto h12 = std::chrono::hours(12);
2996  if (mode_ == pm) {
2997  if (h != h12) h = h + h12;
2998  } else if (h == h12) {
2999  h = std::chrono::hours(0);
3000  }
3001  }
3002  return h;
3003 }
3004 
3005 CONSTCD14
3006 inline void time_of_day_base::make24() NOEXCEPT {
3007  h_ = to24hr();
3008  mode_ = is24hr;
3009 }
3010 
3011 CONSTCD14
3012 inline void time_of_day_base::make12() NOEXCEPT {
3013  if (mode_ == is24hr) {
3014  CONSTDATA auto h12 = std::chrono::hours(12);
3015  if (h_ >= h12) {
3016  if (h_ > h12) h_ = h_ - h12;
3017  mode_ = pm;
3018  } else {
3019  if (h_ == std::chrono::hours(0)) h_ = h12;
3020  mode_ = am;
3021  }
3022  }
3023 }

3442 template <class Duration>
3443 struct fields {
3444  year_month_day ymd{nanyear / 0 / 0};
3445  weekday wd{8u};
3446  time_of_day<Duration> tod{};
3447  bool has_tod = false;
3448 
3449  fields() = default;
3450 
3451  explicit fields(year_month_day ymd_) : ymd(ymd_) {}
3452  explicit fields(weekday wd_) : wd(wd_) {}
3453  explicit fields(time_of_day<Duration> tod_) : tod(tod_), has_tod(true) {}
3454 
3455  fields(year_month_day ymd_, weekday wd_) : ymd(ymd_), wd(wd_) {}
3456  fields(year_month_day ymd_, time_of_day<Duration> tod_)
3457  : ymd(ymd_), tod(tod_), has_tod(true) {}
3458 
3459  fields(weekday wd_, time_of_day<Duration> tod_) : wd(wd_), tod(tod_), has_tod(true) {}
3460 
3461  fields(year_month_day ymd_, weekday wd_, time_of_day<Duration> tod_)
3462  : ymd(ymd_), wd(wd_), tod(tod_), has_tod(true) {}
3463 };

3467 template <class CharT, class Traits, class Duration>
3468 unsigned extract_weekday(std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& os,
3469  const fields<Duration>& fds) {
3470  if (!fds.ymd.ok() && !fds.wd.ok()) {
3471  // fds does not contain a valid weekday
3472  os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
3473  return 8;
3474  }
3475  weekday wd;
3476  if (fds.ymd.ok()) {
3477  wd = weekday{sys_days(fds.ymd)};
3478  if (fds.wd.ok() && wd != fds.wd) {
3479  // fds.ymd and fds.wd are inconsistent
3480  os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
3481  return 8;
3482  }
3483  } else {
3484  wd = fds.wd;
3485  }
3486  return static_cast<unsigned>((wd - Sunday).count());
3487 }
3488 
3489 template <class CharT, class Traits, class Duration>
3490 unsigned extract_month(std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& os,
3491  const fields<Duration>& fds) {
3492  if (!fds.ymd.month().ok()) {
3493  // fds does not contain a valid month
3494  os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
3495  return 0;
3496  }
3497  return static_cast<unsigned>(fds.ymd.month());
3498 }

3526 template <class CharT, class Traits, class FwdIter>
3527 FwdIter scan_keyword(std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, FwdIter kb, FwdIter ke) {
3528  size_t nkw = static_cast<size_t>(std::distance(kb, ke));
3529  const unsigned char doesnt_match = '\0';
3530  const unsigned char might_match = '\1';
3531  const unsigned char does_match = '\2';
3532  unsigned char statbuf[100];
3533  unsigned char* status = statbuf;
3534  unique_ptr<unsigned char, void (*)(void*)> stat_hold(0, free);
3535  if (nkw > sizeof(statbuf)) {
3536  status = (unsigned char*)malloc(nkw);
3537  if (status == nullptr) throw bad_alloc();
3538  stat_hold.reset(status);
3539  }
3540  size_t n_might_match = nkw; // At this point, any keyword might match
3541  size_t n_does_match = 0; // but none of them definitely do
3542  // Initialize all statuses to might_match, except for "" keywords are does_match
3543  unsigned char* st = status;
3544  for (auto ky = kb; ky != ke; ++ky, ++st) {
3545  if (!ky->empty()) {
3546  *st = might_match;
3547  } else {
3548  *st = does_match;
3549  --n_might_match;
3550  ++n_does_match;
3551  }
3552  }
3553  // While there might be a match, test keywords against the next CharT
3554  for (size_t indx = 0; is && n_might_match > 0; ++indx) {
3555  // Peek at the next CharT but don't consume it
3556  auto ic = is.peek();
3557  if (ic == EOF) {
3558  is.setstate(ios::eofbit);
3559  break;
3560  }
3561  auto c = static_cast<char>(toupper(ic));
3562  bool consume = false;
3563  // For each keyword which might match, see if the indx character is c
3564  // If a match if found, consume c
3565  // If a match is found, and that is the last character in the keyword,
3566  // then that keyword matches.
3567  // If the keyword doesn't match this character, then change the keyword
3568  // to doesn't match
3569  st = status;
3570  for (auto ky = kb; ky != ke; ++ky, ++st) {
3571  if (*st == might_match) {
3572  if (c == static_cast<char>(toupper((*ky)[indx]))) {
3573  consume = true;
3574  if (ky->size() == indx + 1) {
3575  *st = does_match;
3576  --n_might_match;
3577  ++n_does_match;
3578  }
3579  } else {
3580  *st = doesnt_match;
3581  --n_might_match;
3582  }
3583  }
3584  }
3585  // consume if we matched a character
3586  if (consume) {
3587  (void)is.get();
3588  // If we consumed a character and there might be a matched keyword that
3589  // was marked matched on a previous iteration, then such keywords
3590  // are now marked as not matching.
3591  if (n_might_match + n_does_match > 1) {
3592  st = status;
3593  for (auto ky = kb; ky != ke; ++ky, ++st) {
3594  if (*st == does_match && ky->size() != indx + 1) {
3595  *st = doesnt_match;
3596  --n_does_match;
3597  }
3598  }
3599  }
3600  }
3601  }
3602  // We've exited the loop because we hit eof and/or we have no more "might matches".
3603  // Return the first matching result
3604  for (st = status; kb != ke; ++kb, ++st)
3605  if (*st == does_match) break;
3606  if (kb == ke) is.setstate(ios_base::failbit);
3607  return kb;
3608 }
3609 
3610 } // namespace detail
3611 
3612 #endif // ONLY_C_LOCALE
3613 
3614 template <class CharT, class Traits, class Duration>
3615 std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& to_stream(std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& os,
3616  const CharT* fmt,
3617  const fields<Duration>& fds,
3618  const std::string* abbrev,
3619  const std::chrono::seconds* offset_sec) {
3620  using std::chrono::duration_cast;
3621  using std::chrono::duration;
3622  using std::use_facet;
3623  using std::chrono::hours;
3624  using std::chrono::minutes;
3625  using detail::save_ostream;
3626  using std::ios;
3627  using std::time_put;
3628  date::detail::save_ostream<CharT, Traits> ss(os);
3629  os.fill(' ');
3630  os.flags(std::ios::skipws | std::ios::dec);
3631  os.width(0);
3632  tm tm{};
3633  bool insert_negative = fds.has_tod && fds.tod.to_duration() < Duration::zero();
3634 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
3635  auto& facet = use_facet<time_put<CharT>>(os.getloc());
3636 #endif
3637  const CharT* command = nullptr;
3638  CharT modified = CharT{};
3639  for (; *fmt; ++fmt) {
3640  switch (*fmt) {
3641  case 'a':
3642  case 'A':
3643  if (command) {
3644  if (modified == CharT{}) {
3645  tm.tm_wday = static_cast<int>(extract_weekday(os, fds));
3646  if (os.fail()) return os;
3647 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
3648  const CharT f[] = {'%', *fmt};
3649  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), end(f));
3650 #else // ONLY_C_LOCALE
3651  os << weekday_names().first[tm.tm_wday + 7 * (*fmt == 'a')];
3652 #endif // ONLY_C_LOCALE
3653  } else {
3654  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
3655  modified = CharT{};
3656  }
3657  command = nullptr;
3658  } else {
3659  os << *fmt;
3660  }
3661  break;
3662  case 'b':
3663  case 'B':
3664  case 'h':
3665  if (command) {
3666  if (modified == CharT{}) {
3667  tm.tm_mon = static_cast<int>(extract_month(os, fds)) - 1;
3668 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
3669  const CharT f[] = {'%', *fmt};
3670  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), end(f));
3671 #else // ONLY_C_LOCALE
3672  os << month_names().first[tm.tm_mon + 12 * (*fmt != 'B')];
3673 #endif // ONLY_C_LOCALE
3674  } else {
3675  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
3676  modified = CharT{};
3677  }
3678  command = nullptr;
3679  } else {
3680  os << *fmt;
3681  }
3682  break;
3683  case 'c':
3684  case 'x':
3685  if (command) {
3686  if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
3687  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
3688  } else {
3689  if (!fds.ymd.ok()) os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
3690  if (*fmt == 'c' && !fds.has_tod) os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
3691 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
3692  tm = std::tm{};
3693  auto const& ymd = fds.ymd;
3694  auto ld = local_days(ymd);
3695  if (*fmt == 'c') {
3696  tm.tm_sec = static_cast<int>(fds.tod.seconds().count());
3697  tm.tm_min = static_cast<int>(fds.tod.minutes().count());
3698  tm.tm_hour = static_cast<int>(fds.tod.hours().count());
3699  }
3700  tm.tm_mday = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned>(ymd.day()));
3701  tm.tm_mon = static_cast<int>(extract_month(os, fds) - 1);
3702  tm.tm_year = static_cast<int>(ymd.year()) - 1900;
3703  tm.tm_wday = static_cast<int>(extract_weekday(os, fds));
3704  if (os.fail()) return os;
3705  tm.tm_yday = static_cast<int>((ld - local_days(ymd.year() / 1 / 1)).count());
3706  CharT f[3] = {'%'};
3707  auto fe = begin(f) + 1;
3708  if (modified == CharT{'E'}) *fe++ = modified;
3709  *fe++ = *fmt;
3710  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), fe);
3711 #else // ONLY_C_LOCALE
3712  if (*fmt == 'c') {
3713  auto wd = static_cast<int>(extract_weekday(os, fds));
3714  os << weekday_names().first[static_cast<unsigned>(wd) + 7] << ' ';
3715  os << month_names().first[extract_month(os, fds) - 1 + 12] << ' ';
3716  auto d = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned>(fds.ymd.day()));
3717  if (d < 10) {
3718  os << ' ';
3719  }
3720  os << d << ' ' << make_time(duration_cast<seconds>(fds.tod.to_duration()))
3721  << ' ' << fds.ymd.year();
3722  } else { // *fmt == 'x'
3723  auto const& ymd = fds.ymd;
3724  save_ostream<CharT, Traits> _(os);
3725  os.fill('0');
3726  os.flags(std::ios::dec | std::ios::right);
3727  os.width(2);
3728  os << static_cast<unsigned>(ymd.month()) << CharT{'/'};
3729  os.width(2);
3730  os << static_cast<unsigned>(ymd.day()) << CharT{'/'};
3731  os.width(2);
3732  os << static_cast<int>(ymd.year()) % 100;
3733  }
3734 #endif // ONLY_C_LOCALE
3735  }
3736  command = nullptr;
3737  modified = CharT{};
3738  } else {
3739  os << *fmt;
3740  }
3741  break;
3742  case 'C':
3743  if (command) {
3744  if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
3745  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
3746  } else {
3747  if (!fds.ymd.year().ok()) os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
3748  auto y = static_cast<int>(fds.ymd.year());
3749 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
3750  if (modified == CharT{})
3751 #endif
3752  {
3753  save_ostream<CharT, Traits> _(os);
3754  os.fill('0');
3755  os.flags(std::ios::dec | std::ios::right);
3756  if (y >= 0) {
3757  os.width(2);
3758  os << y / 100;
3759  } else {
3760  os << CharT{'-'};
3761  os.width(2);
3762  os << -(y - 99) / 100;
3763  }
3764  }
3765 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
3766  else if (modified == CharT{'E'}) {
3767  tm.tm_year = y - 1900;
3768  CharT f[3] = {'%', 'E', 'C'};
3769  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), end(f));
3770  }
3771 #endif
3772  }
3773  command = nullptr;
3774  modified = CharT{};
3775  } else {
3776  os << *fmt;
3777  }
3778  break;
3779  case 'd':
3780  case 'e':
3781  if (command) {
3782  if (modified == CharT{'E'}) {
3783  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
3784  } else {
3785  if (!fds.ymd.day().ok()) os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
3786  auto d = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned>(fds.ymd.day()));
3787 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
3788  if (modified == CharT{})
3789 #endif
3790  {
3791  save_ostream<CharT, Traits> _(os);
3792  if (*fmt == CharT{'d'}) {
3793  os.fill('0');
3794  } else {
3795  os.fill(' ');
3796  }
3797  os.flags(std::ios::dec | std::ios::right);
3798  os.width(2);
3799  os << d;
3800  }
3801 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
3802  else if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {

3805  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), end(f));

3836  } else {

3870  auto ld = local_days(fds.ymd);
3871  auto y = year_month_day{ld + days{3}}.year();
3872  auto start = local_days((y - years{1}) / December / Thursday[last]) +

4132  }
4133  break;
4134  case 't':
4135  if (command) {
4136  if (modified == CharT{}) {
4137  os << CharT{'\t'};
4138  } else {
4139  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
4140  modified = CharT{};
4141  }
4142  command = nullptr;
4143  } else {
4144  os << *fmt;
4145  }
4146  break;
4147  case 'T':
4148  if (command) {
4149  if (modified == CharT{}) {
4150  if (!fds.has_tod) os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4151  os << fds.tod;
4152  } else {
4153  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
4154  modified = CharT{};
4155  }
4156  command = nullptr;
4157  } else {
4158  os << *fmt;
4159  }
4160  break;
4161  case 'u':
4162  if (command) {
4163  if (modified == CharT{'E'}) {
4164  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
4165  }
4166  else {
4167  auto wd = extract_weekday(os, fds);
4168 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4169  if (modified == CharT{})
4170 #endif
4171  {
4172  os << (wd != 0 ? wd : 7u);
4173  }
4174 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4175  else if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
4176  const CharT f[] = {'%', modified, *fmt};
4177  tm.tm_wday = static_cast<int>(wd);
4178  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), end(f));
4179  }
4180 #endif
4181  }
4182  modified = CharT{};
4183  command = nullptr;
4184  } else {
4185  os << *fmt;
4186  }
4187  break;
4188  case 'U':
4189  if (command) {
4190  if (modified == CharT{'E'}) {
4191  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
4192  } else {
4193  auto const& ymd = fds.ymd;
4194  if (!ymd.ok()) os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4195  auto ld = local_days(ymd);
4196 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4197  if (modified == CharT{})
4198 #endif
4199  {
4200  auto st = local_days(Sunday[1] / January / ymd.year());
4201  if (ld < st)
4202  os << CharT{'0'} << CharT{'0'};
4203  else {
4204  auto wn = duration_cast<weeks>(ld - st).count() + 1;
4205  if (wn < 10) os << CharT{'0'};
4206  os << wn;
4207  }
4208  }
4209 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4210  else if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
4211  const CharT f[] = {'%', modified, *fmt};
4212  tm.tm_year = static_cast<int>(ymd.year()) - 1900;
4213  tm.tm_wday = static_cast<int>(extract_weekday(os, fds));
4214  if (os.fail()) return os;
4215  tm.tm_yday =
4216  static_cast<int>((ld - local_days(ymd.year() / 1 / 1)).count());
4217  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), end(f));
4218  }
4219 #endif
4220  }
4221  modified = CharT{};
4222  command = nullptr;
4223  } else {
4224  os << *fmt;
4225  }
4226  break;
4227  case 'V':
4228  if (command) {
4229  if (modified == CharT{'E'}) {
4230  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
4231  } else {
4232  if (!fds.ymd.ok()) os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4233  auto ld = local_days(fds.ymd);
4234 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4235  if (modified == CharT{})
4236 #endif
4237  {
4238  auto y = year_month_day{ld + days{3}}.year();
4239  auto st =
4240  local_days((y - years{1}) / 12 / Thursday[last]) + (Monday - Thursday);
4241  if (ld < st) {
4242  --y;
4243  st = local_days((y - years{1}) / 12 / Thursday[last]) +
4244  (Monday - Thursday);
4245  }
4246  auto wn = duration_cast<weeks>(ld - st).count() + 1;
4247  if (wn < 10) os << CharT{'0'};
4248  os << wn;
4249  }
4250 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4251  else if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
4252  const CharT f[] = {'%', modified, *fmt};
4253  auto const& ymd = fds.ymd;
4254  tm.tm_year = static_cast<int>(ymd.year()) - 1900;
4255  tm.tm_wday = static_cast<int>(extract_weekday(os, fds));
4256  if (os.fail()) return os;
4257  tm.tm_yday =
4258  static_cast<int>((ld - local_days(ymd.year() / 1 / 1)).count());
4259  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), end(f));
4260  }
4261 #endif
4262  }
4263  modified = CharT{};
4264  command = nullptr;
4265  } else {
4266  os << *fmt;
4267  }
4268  break;
4269  case 'w':
4270  if (command) {
4271  auto wd = extract_weekday(os, fds);
4272  if (os.fail()) return os;
4273 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4274  if (modified == CharT{})
4275 #else
4276  if (modified != CharT{'E'})
4277 #endif
4278  {
4279  os << wd;
4280  }
4281 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4282  else if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
4283  const CharT f[] = {'%', modified, *fmt};
4284  tm.tm_wday = static_cast<int>(wd);
4285  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), end(f));
4286  }
4287 #endif
4288  else {
4289  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
4290  }
4291  modified = CharT{};
4292  command = nullptr;
4293  } else {
4294  os << *fmt;
4295  }
4296  break;
4297  case 'W':
4298  if (command) {
4299  if (modified == CharT{'E'}) {
4300  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
4301  } else {
4302  auto const& ymd = fds.ymd;
4303  if (!ymd.ok()) os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4304  auto ld = local_days(ymd);
4305 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4306  if (modified == CharT{})
4307 #endif
4308  {
4309  auto st = local_days(Monday[1] / January / ymd.year());
4310  if (ld < st)
4311  os << CharT{'0'} << CharT{'0'};
4312  else {
4313  auto wn = duration_cast<weeks>(ld - st).count() + 1;
4314  if (wn < 10) os << CharT{'0'};
4315  os << wn;
4316  }
4317  }
4318 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4319  else if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
4320  const CharT f[] = {'%', modified, *fmt};
4321  tm.tm_year = static_cast<int>(ymd.year()) - 1900;
4322  tm.tm_wday = static_cast<int>(extract_weekday(os, fds));
4323  if (os.fail()) return os;
4324  tm.tm_yday =
4325  static_cast<int>((ld - local_days(ymd.year() / 1 / 1)).count());
4326  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), end(f));
4327  }
4328 #endif
4329  }
4330  modified = CharT{};
4331  command = nullptr;
4332  } else
4333  os << *fmt;
4334  break;
4335  case 'X':
4336  if (command) {
4337  if (modified == CharT{'O'})
4338  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
4339  else {
4340  if (!fds.has_tod) os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4341 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4342  tm = std::tm{};
4343  tm.tm_sec = static_cast<int>(fds.tod.seconds().count());
4344  tm.tm_min = static_cast<int>(fds.tod.minutes().count());
4345  tm.tm_hour = static_cast<int>(fds.tod.hours().count());
4346  CharT f[3] = {'%'};
4347  auto fe = begin(f) + 1;
4348  if (modified == CharT{'E'}) *fe++ = modified;
4349  *fe++ = *fmt;
4350  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), fe);
4351 #else
4352  os << fds.tod;
4353 #endif
4354  }
4355  command = nullptr;
4356  modified = CharT{};
4357  } else
4358  os << *fmt;
4359  break;
4360  case 'y':
4361  if (command) {
4362  if (!fds.ymd.year().ok()) os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4363  auto y = static_cast<int>(fds.ymd.year());
4364 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4365  if (modified == CharT{}) {
4366 #endif
4367  y = std::abs(y) % 100;
4368  if (y < 10) os << CharT{'0'};
4369  os << y;
4370 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4371  } else {
4372  const CharT f[] = {'%', modified, *fmt};
4373  tm.tm_year = y - 1900;
4374  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), end(f));
4375  }
4376 #endif
4377  modified = CharT{};
4378  command = nullptr;
4379  } else
4380  os << *fmt;
4381  break;
4382  case 'Y':
4383  if (command) {
4384  if (modified == CharT{'O'})
4385  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
4386  else {
4387  if (!fds.ymd.year().ok()) os.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4388  auto y = fds.ymd.year();
4389 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4390  if (modified == CharT{})
4391 #endif
4392  {
4393  os << y;
4394  }
4395 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4396  else if (modified == CharT{'E'}) {
4397  const CharT f[] = {'%', modified, *fmt};
4398  tm.tm_year = static_cast<int>(y) - 1900;
4399  facet.put(os, os, os.fill(), &tm, begin(f), end(f));
4400  }
4401 #endif
4402  }
4403  modified = CharT{};
4404  command = nullptr;
4405  } else
4406  os << *fmt;
4407  break;
4408  case 'z':
4409  if (command) {
4410  if (offset_sec == nullptr) {
4411  // Can not format %z with unknown offset
4412  os.setstate(ios::failbit);
4413  return os;
4414  }
4415  auto m = duration_cast<minutes>(*offset_sec);
4416  auto neg = m < minutes{0};
4417  m = date::abs(m);
4418  auto h = duration_cast<hours>(m);
4419  m -= h;
4420  if (neg)
4421  os << CharT{'-'};
4422  else
4423  os << CharT{'+'};
4424  if (h < hours{10}) os << CharT{'0'};
4425  os << h.count();
4426  if (modified != CharT{}) os << CharT{':'};
4427  if (m < minutes{10}) os << CharT{'0'};
4428  os << m.count();
4429  command = nullptr;
4430  modified = CharT{};
4431  } else
4432  os << *fmt;
4433  break;
4434  case 'Z':
4435  if (command) {
4436  if (modified == CharT{}) {
4437  if (abbrev == nullptr) {
4438  // Can not format %Z with unknown time_zone
4439  os.setstate(ios::failbit);
4440  return os;
4441  }
4442  for (auto c : *abbrev) os << CharT(c);
4443  } else {
4444  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
4445  modified = CharT{};
4446  }
4447  command = nullptr;
4448  } else
4449  os << *fmt;
4450  break;
4451  case 'E':
4452  case 'O':
4453  if (command) {
4454  if (modified == CharT{}) {
4455  modified = *fmt;
4456  } else {
4457  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << *fmt;
4458  command = nullptr;
4459  modified = CharT{};
4460  }
4461  } else
4462  os << *fmt;
4463  break;
4464  case '%':
4465  if (command) {
4466  if (modified == CharT{}) {
4467  os << CharT{'%'};
4468  command = nullptr;
4469  } else {
4470  os << CharT{'%'} << modified << CharT{'%'};
4471  command = nullptr;
4472  modified = CharT{};
4473  }
4474  } else
4475  command = fmt;
4476  break;
4477  default:
4478  if (command) {
4479  os << CharT{'%'};
4480  command = nullptr;
4481  }
4482  if (modified != CharT{}) {
4483  os << modified;
4484  modified = CharT{};
4485  }
4486  os << *fmt;
4487  break;
4488  }
4489  }
4490  if (command) os << CharT{'%'};
4491  if (modified != CharT{}) os << modified;
4492  return os;
4493 }

4555 inline std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& to_stream(
4556  std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& os, const CharT* fmt,
4557  const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>& d) {
4558  using Duration = std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>;
4559  using CT = typename std::common_type<Duration, std::chrono::seconds>::type;
4560  fields<CT> fds{time_of_day<CT>{d}};

4564 template <class CharT, class Traits, class Duration>
4565 std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& to_stream(
4566  std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& os, const CharT* fmt,
4567  const local_time<Duration>& tp, const std::string* abbrev = nullptr,
4568  const std::chrono::seconds* offset_sec = nullptr) {
4569  using CT = typename std::common_type<Duration, std::chrono::seconds>::type;
4570  auto ld = floor<days>(tp);
4571  fields<CT> fds{year_month_day{ld}, time_of_day<CT>{tp - local_seconds{ld}}};
4572  return to_stream(os, fmt, fds, abbrev, offset_sec);
4573 }

4575 template <class CharT, class Traits, class Duration>
4576 std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& to_stream(std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& os,
4577  const CharT* fmt,
4578  const sys_time<Duration>& tp) {
4579  using namespace std::chrono;
4580  using CT = typename std::common_type<Duration, seconds>::type;
4581  const std::string abbrev("UTC");
4582  CONSTDATA seconds offset{0};
4583  auto sd = floor<days>(tp);
4584  fields<CT> fds{year_month_day{sd}, time_of_day<CT>{tp - sys_seconds{sd}}};
4585  return to_stream(os, fmt, fds, &abbrev, &offset);
4586 }

4639 template <class CharT, class Traits>
4640 bool read_char(std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, CharT fmt, std::ios::iostate& err) {
4641  auto ic = is.get();
4642  if (Traits::eq_int_type(ic, Traits::eof()) ||
4643  !Traits::eq(Traits::to_char_type(ic), fmt)) {
4644  err |= std::ios::failbit;
4645  is.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4646  return false;
4647  }
4648  return true;
4649 }
4650 
4651 template <class CharT, class Traits>
4652 unsigned read_unsigned(std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, unsigned m = 1,
4653  unsigned M = 10) {
4654  unsigned x = 0;
4655  unsigned count = 0;
4656  while (true) {
4657  auto ic = is.peek();
4658  if (Traits::eq_int_type(ic, Traits::eof())) break;
4659  auto c = static_cast<char>(Traits::to_char_type(ic));
4660  if (!('0' <= c && c <= '9')) break;
4661  (void)is.get();
4662  ++count;
4663  x = 10 * x + static_cast<unsigned>(c - '0');
4664  if (count == M) break;
4665  }
4666  if (count < m) is.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4667  return x;
4668 }
4669 
4670 template <class CharT, class Traits>
4671 int read_signed(std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, unsigned m = 1, unsigned M = 10) {
4672  auto ic = is.peek();
4673  if (!Traits::eq_int_type(ic, Traits::eof())) {
4674  auto c = static_cast<char>(Traits::to_char_type(ic));
4675  if (('0' <= c && c <= '9') || c == '-' || c == '+') {
4676  if (c == '-' || c == '+') (void)is.get();
4677  auto x = static_cast<int>(read_unsigned(is, std::max(m, 1u), M));
4678  if (!is.fail()) {
4679  if (c == '-') x = -x;
4680  return x;
4681  }
4682  }
4683  }
4684  if (m > 0) is.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4685  return 0;
4686 }
4687 
4688 template <class CharT, class Traits>
4689 long double read_long_double(std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, unsigned m = 1,
4690  unsigned M = 10) {
4691  using namespace std;
4692  unsigned count = 0;
4693  auto decimal_point =
4694  Traits::to_int_type(use_facet<numpunct<CharT>>(is.getloc()).decimal_point());
4695  std::string buf;
4696  while (true) {
4697  auto ic = is.peek();
4698  if (Traits::eq_int_type(ic, Traits::eof())) break;
4699  if (Traits::eq_int_type(ic, decimal_point)) {
4700  buf += '.';
4701  decimal_point = Traits::eof();
4702  is.get();
4703  } else {
4704  auto c = static_cast<char>(Traits::to_char_type(ic));
4705  if (!('0' <= c && c <= '9')) break;
4706  buf += c;
4707  (void)is.get();
4708  }
4709  if (++count == M) break;
4710  }
4711  if (count < m) {
4712  is.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4713  return 0;
4714  }
4715  return std::stold(buf);
4716 }

4740 void read(std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, CharT a0, Args&&... args);
4741

4744

4747

4751 template <class CharT, class Traits, class... Args>
4752 void read(std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, rld a0, Args&&... args);
4753 
4754 template <class CharT, class Traits, class... Args>
4755 void read(std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, CharT a0, Args&&... args) {
4756  // No-op if a0 == CharT{}
4757  if (a0 != CharT{}) {
4758  auto ic = is.peek();
4759  if (Traits::eq_int_type(ic, Traits::eof())) {
4760  is.setstate(std::ios::failbit | std::ios::eofbit);
4761  return;
4762  }
4763  if (!Traits::eq(Traits::to_char_type(ic), a0)) {
4764  is.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4765  return;
4766  }
4767  (void)is.get();
4768  }
4769  read(is, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
4770 }
4771 
4772 template <class CharT, class Traits, class... Args>
4773 void read(std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, rs a0, Args&&... args) {
4774  auto x = read_signed(is, a0.m, a0.M);
4775  if (is.fail()) return;
4776  a0.i = x;
4777  read(is, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
4778 }
4779 
4780 template <class CharT, class Traits, class... Args>
4781 void read(std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, ru a0, Args&&... args) {
4782  auto x = read_unsigned(is, a0.m, a0.M);
4783  if (is.fail()) return;
4784  a0.i = static_cast<int>(x);
4785  read(is, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
4786 }
4787 
4788 template <class CharT, class Traits, class... Args>
4789 void read(std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, int a0, Args&&... args) {
4790  if (a0 != -1) {
4791  auto u = static_cast<unsigned>(a0);
4792  CharT buf[std::numeric_limits<unsigned>::digits10 + 2] = {};
4793  auto e = buf;
4794  do {
4795  *e++ = CharT(u % 10) + CharT{'0'};
4796  u /= 10;
4797  } while (u > 0);
4798  std::reverse(buf, e);
4799  for (auto p = buf; p != e && is.rdstate() == std::ios::goodbit; ++p) read(is, *p);
4800  }
4801  if (is.rdstate() == std::ios::goodbit) read(is, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
4802 }
4803 
4804 template <class CharT, class Traits, class... Args>
4805 void read(std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, rld a0, Args&&... args) {
4806  auto x = read_long_double(is, a0.m, a0.M);
4807  if (is.fail()) return;
4808  a0.i = x;
4809  read(is, std::forward<Args>(args)...);
4810 }
4811 
4812 template <class T, class CharT, class Traits>
4813 inline void checked_set(T& value, T from, T not_a_value,
4814  std::basic_ios<CharT, Traits>& is) {
4815  if (!is.fail()) {
4816  if (value == not_a_value)
4817  value = std::move(from);
4818  else if (value != from)
4819  is.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
4820  }
4821 }
4822 
4823 } // namespace detail
4824 
4825 template <class CharT, class Traits, class Duration, class Alloc = std::allocator<CharT>>
4826 std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& from_stream(
4827  std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, const CharT* fmt, fields<Duration>& fds,
4828  std::basic_string<CharT, Traits, Alloc>* abbrev, std::chrono::minutes* offset) {
4829  using namespace std;
4830  using namespace std::chrono;
4831  typename basic_istream<CharT, Traits>::sentry ok{is, true};
4832  if (ok) {
4833  date::detail::save_istream<CharT, Traits> ss(is);
4834  is.fill(' ');
4835  is.flags(std::ios::skipws | std::ios::dec);
4836  is.width(0);
4837 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4838  auto& f = use_facet<time_get<CharT>>(is.getloc());
4839  std::tm tm{};
4840 #endif
4841  const CharT* command = nullptr;
4842  auto modified = CharT{};
4843  auto width = -1;
4844 
4845  CONSTDATA int not_a_year = numeric_limits<int>::min();
4846  CONSTDATA int not_a_2digit_year = 100;
4847  CONSTDATA int not_a_century = not_a_year / 100;
4848  CONSTDATA int not_a_month = 0;
4849  CONSTDATA int not_a_day = 0;
4850  CONSTDATA int not_a_hour = numeric_limits<int>::min();
4851  CONSTDATA int not_a_hour_12_value = 0;
4852  CONSTDATA int not_a_minute = not_a_hour;
4853  CONSTDATA Duration not_a_second = Duration::min();
4854  CONSTDATA int not_a_doy = 0;
4855  CONSTDATA int not_a_weekday = 8;
4856  CONSTDATA int not_a_week_num = 100;
4857  CONSTDATA int not_a_ampm = -1;
4858  CONSTDATA minutes not_a_offset = minutes::min();
4859 
4860  int Y = not_a_year; // c, F, Y *
4861  int y = not_a_2digit_year; // D, x, y *
4862  int g = not_a_2digit_year; // g *
4863  int G = not_a_year; // G *
4864  int C = not_a_century; // C *
4865  int m = not_a_month; // b, B, h, m, c, D, F, x *
4866  int d = not_a_day; // c, d, D, e, F, x *
4867  int j = not_a_doy; // j *
4868  int wd = not_a_weekday; // a, A, u, w *
4869  int H = not_a_hour; // c, H, R, T, X *
4870  int I = not_a_hour_12_value; // I, r *
4871  int p = not_a_ampm; // p, r *
4872  int M = not_a_minute; // c, M, r, R, T, X *
4873  Duration s = not_a_second; // c, r, S, T, X *
4874  int U = not_a_week_num; // U *
4875  int V = not_a_week_num; // V *
4876  int W = not_a_week_num; // W *
4877  std::basic_string<CharT, Traits, Alloc> temp_abbrev; // Z *
4878  minutes temp_offset = not_a_offset; // z *
4879 
4880  using detail::checked_set;
4881  using detail::read;
4882  using detail::rld;
4883  using detail::rs;
4884  using detail::ru;
4885  for (; *fmt && is.rdstate() == std::ios::goodbit; ++fmt) {
4886  switch (*fmt) {
4887  case 'a':
4888  case 'A':
4889  case 'u':
4890  case 'w': // wd: a, A, u, w
4891  if (command) {
4892  int trial_wd = not_a_weekday;
4893  if (*fmt == 'a' || *fmt == 'A') {
4894  if (modified == CharT{}) {
4895 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4896  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
4897  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
4898  is.setstate(err);
4899  if (!is.fail()) trial_wd = tm.tm_wday;
4900 #else
4901  auto nm = detail::weekday_names();
4902  auto i = detail::scan_keyword(is, nm.first, nm.second) - nm.first;
4903  if (!is.fail()) trial_wd = i % 7;
4904 #endif
4905  } else
4906  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
4907  } else // *fmt == 'u' || *fmt == 'w'
4908  {
4909 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4910  if (modified == CharT{})
4911 #else
4912  if (modified != CharT{'E'})
4913 #endif
4914  {
4915  read(is,
4916  ru{trial_wd, 1, width == -1 ? 1u : static_cast<unsigned>(width)});
4917  if (!is.fail()) {
4918  if (*fmt == 'u') {
4919  if (!(1 <= trial_wd && trial_wd <= 7)) {
4920  trial_wd = not_a_weekday;
4921  is.setstate(ios_base::failbit);
4922  } else if (trial_wd == 7)
4923  trial_wd = 0;
4924  } else // *fmt == 'w'
4925  {
4926  if (!(0 <= trial_wd && trial_wd <= 6)) {
4927  trial_wd = not_a_weekday;
4928  is.setstate(ios_base::failbit);
4929  }
4930  }
4931  }
4932  }
4933 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4934  else if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
4935  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
4936  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
4937  is.setstate(err);
4938  if (!is.fail()) trial_wd = tm.tm_wday;
4939  }
4940 #endif
4941  else
4942  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
4943  }
4944  if (trial_wd != not_a_weekday) checked_set(wd, trial_wd, not_a_weekday, is);
4945  } else // !command
4946  read(is, *fmt);
4947  command = nullptr;
4948  width = -1;
4949  modified = CharT{};
4950  break;
4951  case 'b':
4952  case 'B':
4953  case 'h':
4954  if (command) {
4955  if (modified == CharT{}) {
4956  int ttm = not_a_month;
4957 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4958  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
4959  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
4960  if ((err & ios::failbit) == 0) ttm = tm.tm_mon + 1;
4961  is.setstate(err);
4962 #else
4963  auto nm = detail::month_names();
4964  auto i = detail::scan_keyword(is, nm.first, nm.second) - nm.first;
4965  if (!is.fail()) ttm = i % 12 + 1;
4966 #endif
4967  checked_set(m, ttm, not_a_month, is);
4968  } else
4969  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
4970  command = nullptr;
4971  width = -1;
4972  modified = CharT{};
4973  } else
4974  read(is, *fmt);
4975  break;
4976  case 'c':
4977  if (command) {
4978  if (modified != CharT{'O'}) {
4979 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
4980  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
4981  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
4982  if ((err & ios::failbit) == 0) {
4983  checked_set(Y, tm.tm_year + 1900, not_a_year, is);
4984  checked_set(m, tm.tm_mon + 1, not_a_month, is);
4985  checked_set(d, tm.tm_mday, not_a_day, is);
4986  checked_set(H, tm.tm_hour, not_a_hour, is);
4987  checked_set(M, tm.tm_min, not_a_minute, is);
4988  checked_set(s, duration_cast<Duration>(seconds{tm.tm_sec}), not_a_second,
4989  is);
4990  }
4991  is.setstate(err);
4992 #else
4993  // "%a %b %e %T %Y"
4994  auto nm = detail::weekday_names();
4995  auto i = detail::scan_keyword(is, nm.first, nm.second) - nm.first;
4996  checked_set(wd, static_cast<int>(i % 7), not_a_weekday, is);
4997  ws(is);
4998  nm = detail::month_names();
4999  i = detail::scan_keyword(is, nm.first, nm.second) - nm.first;
5000  checked_set(m, static_cast<int>(i % 12 + 1), not_a_month, is);
5001  ws(is);
5002  int td = not_a_day;
5003  read(is, rs{td, 1, 2});
5004  checked_set(d, td, not_a_day, is);
5005  ws(is);
5006  using dfs = detail::decimal_format_seconds<Duration>;
5007  CONSTDATA auto w = Duration::period::den == 1 ? 2 : 3 + dfs::width;
5008  int tH;
5009  int tM;
5010  long double S;
5011  read(is, ru{tH, 1, 2}, CharT{':'}, ru{tM, 1, 2}, CharT{':'}, rld{S, 1, w});
5012  checked_set(H, tH, not_a_hour, is);
5013  checked_set(M, tM, not_a_minute, is);
5014  checked_set(s, round<Duration>(duration<long double>{S}), not_a_second, is);
5015  ws(is);
5016  int tY = not_a_year;
5017  read(is, rs{tY, 1, 4u});
5018  checked_set(Y, tY, not_a_year, is);
5019 #endif
5020  } else
5021  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5022  command = nullptr;
5023  width = -1;
5024  modified = CharT{};
5025  } else
5026  read(is, *fmt);
5027  break;
5028  case 'x':
5029  if (command) {
5030  if (modified != CharT{'O'}) {
5031 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5032  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
5033  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
5034  if ((err & ios::failbit) == 0) {
5035  checked_set(Y, tm.tm_year + 1900, not_a_year, is);
5036  checked_set(m, tm.tm_mon + 1, not_a_month, is);
5037  checked_set(d, tm.tm_mday, not_a_day, is);
5038  }
5039  is.setstate(err);
5040 #else
5041  // "%m/%d/%y"
5042  int ty = not_a_2digit_year;
5043  int tm = not_a_month;
5044  int td = not_a_day;
5045  read(is, ru{tm, 1, 2}, CharT{'/'}, ru{td, 1, 2}, CharT{'/'}, rs{ty, 1, 2});
5046  checked_set(y, ty, not_a_2digit_year, is);
5047  checked_set(m, tm, not_a_month, is);
5048  checked_set(d, td, not_a_day, is);
5049 #endif
5050  } else
5051  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5052  command = nullptr;
5053  width = -1;
5054  modified = CharT{};
5055  } else
5056  read(is, *fmt);
5057  break;
5058  case 'X':
5059  if (command) {
5060  if (modified != CharT{'O'}) {
5061 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5062  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
5063  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
5064  if ((err & ios::failbit) == 0) {
5065  checked_set(H, tm.tm_hour, not_a_hour, is);
5066  checked_set(M, tm.tm_min, not_a_minute, is);
5067  checked_set(s, duration_cast<Duration>(seconds{tm.tm_sec}), not_a_second,
5068  is);
5069  }
5070  is.setstate(err);
5071 #else
5072  // "%T"
5073  using dfs = detail::decimal_format_seconds<Duration>;
5074  CONSTDATA auto w = Duration::period::den == 1 ? 2 : 3 + dfs::width;
5075  int tH = not_a_hour;
5076  int tM = not_a_minute;
5077  long double S;
5078  read(is, ru{tH, 1, 2}, CharT{':'}, ru{tM, 1, 2}, CharT{':'}, rld{S, 1, w});
5079  checked_set(H, tH, not_a_hour, is);
5080  checked_set(M, tM, not_a_minute, is);
5081  checked_set(s, round<Duration>(duration<long double>{S}), not_a_second, is);
5082 #endif
5083  } else
5084  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5085  command = nullptr;
5086  width = -1;
5087  modified = CharT{};
5088  } else
5089  read(is, *fmt);
5090  break;
5091  case 'C':
5092  if (command) {
5093  int tC = not_a_century;
5094 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5095  if (modified == CharT{}) {
5096 #endif
5097  read(is, rs{tC, 1, width == -1 ? 2u : static_cast<unsigned>(width)});
5098 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5099  } else {
5100  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
5101  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
5102  if ((err & ios::failbit) == 0) {
5103  auto tY = tm.tm_year + 1900;
5104  tC = (tY >= 0 ? tY : tY - 99) / 100;
5105  }
5106  is.setstate(err);
5107  }
5108 #endif
5109  checked_set(C, tC, not_a_century, is);
5110  command = nullptr;
5111  width = -1;
5112  modified = CharT{};
5113  } else
5114  read(is, *fmt);
5115  break;
5116  case 'D':
5117  if (command) {
5118  if (modified == CharT{}) {
5119  int tn = not_a_month;
5120  int td = not_a_day;
5121  int ty = not_a_2digit_year;
5122  read(is, ru{tn, 1, 2}, CharT{'\0'}, CharT{'/'}, CharT{'\0'}, ru{td, 1, 2},
5123  CharT{'\0'}, CharT{'/'}, CharT{'\0'}, rs{ty, 1, 2});
5124  checked_set(y, ty, not_a_2digit_year, is);
5125  checked_set(m, tn, not_a_month, is);
5126  checked_set(d, td, not_a_day, is);
5127  } else
5128  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5129  command = nullptr;
5130  width = -1;
5131  modified = CharT{};
5132  } else
5133  read(is, *fmt);
5134  break;
5135  case 'F':
5136  if (command) {
5137  if (modified == CharT{}) {
5138  int tY = not_a_year;
5139  int tn = not_a_month;
5140  int td = not_a_day;
5141  read(is, rs{tY, 1, width == -1 ? 4u : static_cast<unsigned>(width)},
5142  CharT{'-'}, ru{tn, 1, 2}, CharT{'-'}, ru{td, 1, 2});
5143  checked_set(Y, tY, not_a_year, is);
5144  checked_set(m, tn, not_a_month, is);
5145  checked_set(d, td, not_a_day, is);
5146  } else
5147  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5148  command = nullptr;
5149  width = -1;
5150  modified = CharT{};
5151  } else
5152  read(is, *fmt);
5153  break;
5154  case 'd':
5155  case 'e':
5156  if (command) {
5157 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5158  if (modified == CharT{})
5159 #else
5160  if (modified != CharT{'E'})
5161 #endif
5162  {
5163  int td = not_a_day;
5164  read(is, rs{td, 1, width == -1 ? 2u : static_cast<unsigned>(width)});
5165  checked_set(d, td, not_a_day, is);
5166  }
5167 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5168  else if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
5169  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
5170  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
5171  command = nullptr;
5172  width = -1;
5173  modified = CharT{};
5174  if ((err & ios::failbit) == 0) checked_set(d, tm.tm_mday, not_a_day, is);
5175  is.setstate(err);
5176  }
5177 #endif
5178  else
5179  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5180  command = nullptr;
5181  width = -1;
5182  modified = CharT{};
5183  } else
5184  read(is, *fmt);
5185  break;
5186  case 'H':
5187  if (command) {
5188 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5189  if (modified == CharT{})
5190 #else
5191  if (modified != CharT{'E'})
5192 #endif
5193  {
5194  int tH = not_a_hour;
5195  read(is, ru{tH, 1, width == -1 ? 2u : static_cast<unsigned>(width)});
5196  checked_set(H, tH, not_a_hour, is);
5197  }
5198 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5199  else if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
5200  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
5201  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
5202  if ((err & ios::failbit) == 0) checked_set(H, tm.tm_hour, not_a_hour, is);
5203  is.setstate(err);
5204  }
5205 #endif
5206  else
5207  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5208  command = nullptr;
5209  width = -1;
5210  modified = CharT{};
5211  } else
5212  read(is, *fmt);
5213  break;
5214  case 'I':
5215  if (command) {
5216  if (modified == CharT{}) {
5217  int tI = not_a_hour_12_value;
5218  // reads in an hour into I, but most be in [1, 12]
5219  read(is, rs{tI, 1, width == -1 ? 2u : static_cast<unsigned>(width)});
5220  if (!(1 <= tI && tI <= 12)) is.setstate(ios::failbit);
5221  checked_set(I, tI, not_a_hour_12_value, is);
5222  } else
5223  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5224  command = nullptr;
5225  width = -1;
5226  modified = CharT{};
5227  } else
5228  read(is, *fmt);
5229  break;
5230  case 'j':
5231  if (command) {
5232  if (modified == CharT{}) {
5233  int tj = not_a_doy;
5234  read(is, ru{tj, 1, width == -1 ? 3u : static_cast<unsigned>(width)});
5235  checked_set(j, tj, not_a_doy, is);
5236  } else
5237  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5238  command = nullptr;
5239  width = -1;
5240  modified = CharT{};
5241  } else
5242  read(is, *fmt);
5243  break;
5244  case 'M':
5245  if (command) {
5246 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5247  if (modified == CharT{})
5248 #else
5249  if (modified != CharT{'E'})
5250 #endif
5251  {
5252  int tM = not_a_minute;
5253  read(is, ru{tM, 1, width == -1 ? 2u : static_cast<unsigned>(width)});
5254  checked_set(M, tM, not_a_minute, is);
5255  }
5256 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5257  else if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
5258  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
5259  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
5260  if ((err & ios::failbit) == 0) checked_set(M, tm.tm_min, not_a_minute, is);
5261  is.setstate(err);
5262  }
5263 #endif
5264  else
5265  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5266  command = nullptr;
5267  width = -1;
5268  modified = CharT{};
5269  } else
5270  read(is, *fmt);
5271  break;
5272  case 'm':
5273  if (command) {
5274 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5275  if (modified == CharT{})
5276 #else
5277  if (modified != CharT{'E'})
5278 #endif
5279  {
5280  int tn = not_a_month;
5281  read(is, rs{tn, 1, width == -1 ? 2u : static_cast<unsigned>(width)});
5282  checked_set(m, tn, not_a_month, is);
5283  }
5284 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5285  else if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
5286  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
5287  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
5288  if ((err & ios::failbit) == 0)
5289  checked_set(m, tm.tm_mon + 1, not_a_month, is);
5290  is.setstate(err);
5291  }
5292 #endif
5293  else
5294  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5295  command = nullptr;
5296  width = -1;
5297  modified = CharT{};
5298  } else
5299  read(is, *fmt);
5300  break;
5301  case 'n':
5302  case 't':
5303  if (command) {
5304  if (modified == CharT{}) {
5305  // %n matches a single white space character
5306  // %t matches 0 or 1 white space characters
5307  auto ic = is.peek();
5308  if (Traits::eq_int_type(ic, Traits::eof())) {
5309  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::eofbit;
5310  if (*fmt == 'n') err |= ios_base::failbit;
5311  is.setstate(err);
5312  break;
5313  }
5314  if (isspace(ic)) {
5315  (void)is.get();
5316  } else if (*fmt == 'n')
5317  is.setstate(ios_base::failbit);
5318  } else
5319  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5320  command = nullptr;
5321  width = -1;
5322  modified = CharT{};
5323  } else
5324  read(is, *fmt);
5325  break;
5326  case 'p':
5327  if (command) {
5328  if (modified == CharT{}) {
5329  int tp = not_a_ampm;
5330 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5331  tm = std::tm{};
5332  tm.tm_hour = 1;
5333  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
5334  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
5335  is.setstate(err);
5336  if (tm.tm_hour == 1)
5337  tp = 0;
5338  else if (tm.tm_hour == 13)
5339  tp = 1;
5340  else
5341  is.setstate(err);
5342 #else
5343  auto nm = detail::ampm_names();
5344  auto i = detail::scan_keyword(is, nm.first, nm.second) - nm.first;
5345  tp = i;
5346 #endif
5347  checked_set(p, tp, not_a_ampm, is);
5348  } else
5349  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5350  command = nullptr;
5351  width = -1;
5352  modified = CharT{};
5353  } else
5354  read(is, *fmt);
5355 
5356  break;
5357  case 'r':
5358  if (command) {
5359  if (modified == CharT{}) {
5360 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5361  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;
5362  f.get(is, nullptr, is, err, &tm, command, fmt + 1);
5363  if ((err & ios::failbit) == 0) {
5364  checked_set(H, tm.tm_hour, not_a_hour, is);
5365  checked_set(M, tm.tm_min, not_a_hour, is);
5366  checked_set(s, duration_cast<Duration>(seconds{tm.tm_sec}), not_a_second,
5367  is);
5368  }
5369  is.setstate(err);
5370 #else
5371  // "%I:%M:%S %p"
5372  using dfs = detail::decimal_format_seconds<Duration>;
5373  CONSTDATA auto w = Duration::period::den == 1 ? 2 : 3 + dfs::width;
5374  long double S;
5375  int tI = not_a_hour_12_value;
5376  int tM = not_a_minute;
5377  read(is, ru{tI, 1, 2}, CharT{':'}, ru{tM, 1, 2}, CharT{':'}, rld{S, 1, w});
5378  checked_set(I, tI, not_a_hour_12_value, is);
5379  checked_set(M, tM, not_a_minute, is);
5380  checked_set(s, round<Duration>(duration<long double>{S}), not_a_second, is);
5381  ws(is);
5382  auto nm = detail::ampm_names();
5383  auto i = detail::scan_keyword(is, nm.first, nm.second) - nm.first;
5384  checked_set(p, static_cast<int>(i), not_a_ampm, is);
5385 #endif
5386  } else
5387  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5388  command = nullptr;
5389  width = -1;
5390  modified = CharT{};
5391  } else
5392  read(is, *fmt);
5393  break;
5394  case 'R':
5395  if (command) {
5396  if (modified == CharT{}) {
5397  int tH = not_a_hour;
5398  int tM = not_a_minute;
5399  read(is, ru{tH, 1, 2}, CharT{'\0'}, CharT{':'}, CharT{'\0'}, ru{tM, 1, 2},
5400  CharT{'\0'});
5401  checked_set(H, tH, not_a_hour, is);
5402  checked_set(M, tM, not_a_minute, is);
5403  } else
5404  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5405  command = nullptr;
5406  width = -1;
5407  modified = CharT{};
5408  } else
5409  read(is, *fmt);
5410  break;
5411  case 'S':
5412  if (command) {
5413 #if !ONLY_C_LOCALE
5414  if (modified == CharT{})
5415 #else
5416  if (modified != CharT{'E'})
5417 #endif

5419  using dfs = detail::decimal_format_seconds<Duration>;
5420  CONSTDATA auto w = Duration::period::den == 1 ? 2 : 3 + dfs::width;
5421  long double S;

5423  checked_set(s, round<Duration>(duration<long double>{S}), not_a_second, is);
5424  }

5426  else if (modified == CharT{'O'}) {
5427  ios_base::iostate err = ios_base::goodbit;

5429  if ((err & ios::failbit) == 0)
5430  checked_set(s, duration_cast<Duration>(seconds{tm.tm_sec}), not_a_second,
5431  is);

5433  }

5440  } else

5445  if (modified == CharT{}) {

5448  int tH = not_a_hour;
5449  int tM = not_a_minute;
5450  long double S;

5480  checked_set(Y, tm.tm_year + 1900, not_a_year, is);

5491  break;

5500  checked_set(y, ty, not_a_2digit_year, is);
5501  }

5577  read(is, ru{tW, 1, width == -1 ? 2u : static_cast<unsigned>(width)});
5578  checked_set(W, tW, not_a_week_num, is);
5579  } else
5580  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5581  command = nullptr;

5584  } else
5585  read(is, *fmt);
5586  break;
5587  case 'E':
5588  case 'O':
5589  if (command) {
5590  if (modified == CharT{}) {
5591  modified = *fmt;
5592  } else {
5593  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5594  command = nullptr;
5595  width = -1;
5596  modified = CharT{};
5597  }
5598  } else
5599  read(is, *fmt);
5600  break;
5601  case '%':
5602  if (command) {
5603  if (modified == CharT{})
5604  read(is, *fmt);
5605  else
5606  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5607  command = nullptr;
5608  width = -1;
5609  modified = CharT{};
5610  } else
5611  command = fmt;
5612  break;
5613  case 'z':
5614  if (command) {
5615  int tH, tM;
5616  minutes toff = not_a_offset;
5617  bool neg = false;
5618  auto ic = is.peek();
5619  if (!Traits::eq_int_type(ic, Traits::eof())) {
5620  auto c = static_cast<char>(Traits::to_char_type(ic));
5621  if (c == '-') neg = true;
5622  }
5623  if (modified == CharT{}) {
5624  read(is, rs{tH, 2, 2});
5625  if (!is.fail()) toff = hours{std::abs(tH)};
5626  if (is.good()) {
5627  ic = is.peek();
5628  if (!Traits::eq_int_type(ic, Traits::eof())) {
5629  auto c = static_cast<char>(Traits::to_char_type(ic));
5630  if ('0' <= c && c <= '9') {
5631  read(is, ru{tM, 2, 2});
5632  if (!is.fail()) toff += minutes{tM};
5633  }
5634  }
5635  }
5636  } else {
5637  read(is, rs{tH, 1, 2});
5638  if (!is.fail()) toff = hours{std::abs(tH)};
5639  if (is.good()) {
5640  ic = is.peek();
5641  if (!Traits::eq_int_type(ic, Traits::eof())) {
5642  auto c = static_cast<char>(Traits::to_char_type(ic));
5643  if (c == ':') {
5644  (void)is.get();
5645  read(is, ru{tM, 2, 2});
5646  if (!is.fail()) toff += minutes{tM};
5647  }
5648  }
5649  }
5650  }
5651  if (neg) toff = -toff;
5652  checked_set(temp_offset, toff, not_a_offset, is);
5653  command = nullptr;
5654  width = -1;
5655  modified = CharT{};
5656  } else
5657  read(is, *fmt);
5658  break;
5659  case 'Z':
5660  if (command) {
5661  if (modified == CharT{}) {
5662  std::basic_string<CharT, Traits, Alloc> buf;
5663  while (is.rdstate() == std::ios::goodbit) {
5664  auto i = is.rdbuf()->sgetc();
5665  if (Traits::eq_int_type(i, Traits::eof())) {
5666  is.setstate(ios::eofbit);
5667  break;
5668  }
5669  auto wc = Traits::to_char_type(i);
5670  auto c = static_cast<char>(wc);
5671  // is c a valid time zone name or abbreviation character?
5672  if (!(CharT{1} < wc && wc < CharT{127}) ||
5673  !(isalnum(c) || c == '_' || c == '/' || c == '-' || c == '+'))
5674  break;
5675  buf.push_back(c);
5676  is.rdbuf()->sbumpc();
5677  }
5678  if (buf.empty()) is.setstate(ios::failbit);
5679  checked_set(temp_abbrev, buf, {}, is);
5680  } else
5681  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5682  command = nullptr;
5683  width = -1;
5684  modified = CharT{};
5685  } else
5686  read(is, *fmt);
5687  break;
5688  default:
5689  if (command) {
5690  if (width == -1 && modified == CharT{} && '0' <= *fmt && *fmt <= '9') {
5691  width = static_cast<char>(*fmt) - '0';
5692  while ('0' <= fmt[1] && fmt[1] <= '9')
5693  width = 10 * width + static_cast<char>(*++fmt) - '0';
5694  } else {
5695  if (modified == CharT{})
5696  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, *fmt);
5697  else
5698  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified, *fmt);
5699  command = nullptr;
5700  width = -1;
5701  modified = CharT{};
5702  }
5703  } else // !command
5704  {
5705  if (isspace(static_cast<unsigned char>(*fmt)))
5706  ws(is); // space matches 0 or more white space characters
5707  else
5708  read(is, *fmt);
5709  }
5710  break;
5711  }
5712  }
5713  // is.rdstate() != ios::goodbit || *fmt == CharT{}
5714  if (is.rdstate() == ios::goodbit && command) {
5715  if (modified == CharT{})
5716  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width);
5717  else
5718  read(is, CharT{'%'}, width, modified);
5719  }
5720  if (is.rdstate() != ios::goodbit && *fmt != CharT{} && !is.fail())
5721  is.setstate(ios::failbit);
5722  if (!is.fail()) {
5723  if (y != not_a_2digit_year) {
5724  // Convert y and an optional C to Y
5725  if (!(0 <= y && y <= 99)) goto broken;
5726  if (C == not_a_century) {
5727  if (Y == not_a_year) {
5728  if (y >= 69)
5729  C = 19;
5730  else
5731  C = 20;
5732  } else {
5733  C = (Y >= 0 ? Y : Y - 100) / 100;
5734  }
5735  }
5736  int tY;
5737  if (C >= 0)
5738  tY = 100 * C + y;
5739  else
5740  tY = 100 * (C + 1) - (y == 0 ? 100 : y);
5741  if (Y != not_a_year && Y != tY) goto broken;
5742  Y = tY;
5743  }
5744  if (g != not_a_2digit_year) {
5745  // Convert g and an optional C to G
5746  if (!(0 <= g && g <= 99)) goto broken;
5747  if (C == not_a_century) {
5748  if (G == not_a_year) {
5749  if (g >= 69)
5750  C = 19;
5751  else
5752  C = 20;
5753  } else {
5754  C = (G >= 0 ? G : G - 100) / 100;
5755  }
5756  }
5757  int tG;
5758  if (C >= 0)
5759  tG = 100 * C + g;
5760  else
5761  tG = 100 * (C + 1) - (g == 0 ? 100 : g);
5762  if (G != not_a_year && G != tG) goto broken;
5763  G = tG;
5764  }
5765  if (Y < static_cast<int>(year::min()) || Y > static_cast<int>(year::max()))
5766  Y = not_a_year;
5767  bool computed = false;
5768  if (G != not_a_year && V != not_a_week_num && wd != not_a_weekday) {
5769  year_month_day ymd_trial = sys_days(year{G - 1} / December / Thursday[last]) +
5770  (Monday - Thursday) + weeks{V - 1} +
5771  (weekday{static_cast<unsigned>(wd)} - Monday);
5772  if (Y == not_a_year)
5773  Y = static_cast<int>(ymd_trial.year());
5774  else if (year{Y} != ymd_trial.year())
5775  goto broken;
5776  if (m == not_a_month)
5777  m = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned>(ymd_trial.month()));
5778  else if (month(static_cast<unsigned>(m)) != ymd_trial.month())
5779  goto broken;
5780  if (d == not_a_day)
5781  d = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned>(ymd_trial.day()));
5782  else if (day(static_cast<unsigned>(d)) != ymd_trial.day())
5783  goto broken;
5784  computed = true;
5785  }
5786  if (Y != not_a_year && U != not_a_week_num && wd != not_a_weekday) {
5787  year_month_day ymd_trial = sys_days(year{Y} / January / Sunday[1]) +
5788  weeks{U - 1} +
5789  (weekday{static_cast<unsigned>(wd)} - Sunday);
5790  if (Y == not_a_year)
5791  Y = static_cast<int>(ymd_trial.year());
5792  else if (year{Y} != ymd_trial.year())
5793  goto broken;
5794  if (m == not_a_month)
5795  m = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned>(ymd_trial.month()));
5796  else if (month(static_cast<unsigned>(m)) != ymd_trial.month())
5797  goto broken;
5798  if (d == not_a_day)
5799  d = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned>(ymd_trial.day()));
5800  else if (day(static_cast<unsigned>(d)) != ymd_trial.day())
5801  goto broken;
5802  computed = true;
5803  }
5804  if (Y != not_a_year && W != not_a_week_num && wd != not_a_weekday) {
5805  year_month_day ymd_trial = sys_days(year{Y} / January / Monday[1]) +
5806  weeks{W - 1} +
5807  (weekday{static_cast<unsigned>(wd)} - Monday);
5808  if (Y == not_a_year)
5809  Y = static_cast<int>(ymd_trial.year());
5810  else if (year{Y} != ymd_trial.year())
5811  goto broken;
5812  if (m == not_a_month)
5813  m = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned>(ymd_trial.month()));
5814  else if (month(static_cast<unsigned>(m)) != ymd_trial.month())
5815  goto broken;
5816  if (d == not_a_day)
5817  d = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned>(ymd_trial.day()));
5818  else if (day(static_cast<unsigned>(d)) != ymd_trial.day())
5819  goto broken;
5820  computed = true;
5821  }
5822  if (j != 0 && Y != not_a_year) {
5823  auto ymd_trial = year_month_day{local_days(year{Y} / 1 / 1) + days{j - 1}};
5824  if (m == 0)
5825  m = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned>(ymd_trial.month()));
5826  else if (month(static_cast<unsigned>(m)) != ymd_trial.month())
5827  goto broken;
5828  if (d == 0)
5829  d = static_cast<int>(static_cast<unsigned>(ymd_trial.day()));
5830  else if (day(static_cast<unsigned>(d)) != ymd_trial.day())
5831  goto broken;
5832  }
5833  auto ymd = year{Y} / m / d;
5834  if (ymd.ok()) {
5835  if (wd == not_a_weekday)
5836  wd = static_cast<int>((weekday(sys_days(ymd)) - Sunday).count());
5837  else if (wd != static_cast<int>((weekday(sys_days(ymd)) - Sunday).count()))
5838  goto broken;
5839  if (!computed) {
5840  if (G != not_a_year || V != not_a_week_num) {
5841  sys_days sd = ymd;
5842  auto G_trial = year_month_day{sd + days{3}}.year();
5843  auto start = sys_days((G_trial - years{1}) / December / Thursday[last]) +
5844  (Monday - Thursday);
5845  if (sd < start) {
5846  --G_trial;
5847  if (V != not_a_week_num)
5848  start = sys_days((G_trial - years{1}) / December / Thursday[last]) +
5849  (Monday - Thursday);
5850  }
5851  if (G != not_a_year && G != static_cast<int>(G_trial)) goto broken;
5852  if (V != not_a_week_num) {
5853  auto V_trial = duration_cast<weeks>(sd - start).count() + 1;
5854  if (V != V_trial) goto broken;
5855  }
5856  }
5857  if (U != not_a_week_num) {
5858  auto start = sys_days(Sunday[1] / January / ymd.year());
5859  auto U_trial = floor<weeks>(sys_days(ymd) - start).count() + 1;
5860  if (U != U_trial) goto broken;
5861  }
5862  if (W != not_a_week_num) {
5863  auto start = sys_days(Monday[1] / January / ymd.year());
5864  auto W_trial = floor<weeks>(sys_days(ymd) - start).count() + 1;
5865  if (W != W_trial) goto broken;
5866  }
5867  }
5868  }
5869  fds.ymd = ymd;
5870  if (I != not_a_hour_12_value) {
5871  if (!(1 <= I && I <= 12)) goto broken;
5872  if (p != not_a_ampm) {
5873  // p is in [0, 1] == [AM, PM]
5874  // Store trial H in I
5875  if (I == 12) --p;
5876  I += p * 12;
5877  // Either set H from I or make sure H and I are consistent
5878  if (H == not_a_hour)
5879  H = I;
5880  else if (I != H)
5881  goto broken;
5882  } else // p == not_a_ampm
5883  {
5884  // if H, make sure H and I could be consistent
5885  if (H != not_a_hour) {
5886  if (I == 12) {
5887  if (H != 0 && H != 12) goto broken;
5888  } else if (!(I == H || I == H + 12)) {
5889  goto broken;
5890  }
5891  }
5892  }
5893  }
5894  if (H != not_a_hour) {
5895  fds.has_tod = true;
5896  fds.tod = time_of_day<Duration>{hours{H}};
5897  }
5898  if (M != not_a_minute) {
5899  fds.has_tod = true;
5900  fds.tod.m_ = minutes{M};
5901  }
5902  if (s != not_a_second) {
5903  fds.has_tod = true;
5904  fds.tod.s_ = detail::decimal_format_seconds<Duration>{s};
5905  }
5906  if (wd != not_a_weekday) fds.wd = weekday{static_cast<unsigned>(wd)};
5907  if (abbrev != nullptr) *abbrev = std::move(temp_abbrev);
5908  if (offset != nullptr && temp_offset != not_a_offset) *offset = temp_offset;
5909  }
5910  return is;
5911  }
5912 broken:
5913  is.setstate(ios_base::failbit);
5914  return is;
5915 }

6022 template <class Duration, class CharT, class Traits, class Alloc = std::allocator<CharT>>
6023 std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& from_stream(
6024  std::basic_istream<CharT, Traits>& is, const CharT* fmt, sys_time<Duration>& tp,
6025  std::basic_string<CharT, Traits, Alloc>* abbrev = nullptr,
6026  std::chrono::minutes* offset = nullptr) {
6027  using namespace std;
6028  using namespace std::chrono;
6029  using CT = typename common_type<Duration, seconds>::type;
6030  minutes offset_local{};
6031  auto offptr = offset ? offset : &offset_local;
6032  fields<CT> fds{};
6033  fds.has_tod = true;
6034  from_stream(is, fmt, fds, abbrev, offptr);
6035  if (!fds.ymd.ok() || !fds.tod.in_conventional_range()) is.setstate(ios::failbit);
6036  if (!is.fail())
6037  tp = round<Duration>(sys_days(fds.ymd) - *offptr + fds.tod.to_duration());
6038  return is;
6039 }

6189 template <class CharT, std::size_t N>
6190 class string_literal {
6191  CharT p_[N];
6192 
6193  CONSTCD11 string_literal() NOEXCEPT : p_{} {}
6194 
6195  public:
6196  using const_iterator = const CharT*;
6197 
6198  string_literal(string_literal const&) = default;
6199  string_literal& operator=(string_literal const&) = delete;
6200 
6201  template <std::size_t N1 = 2, class = typename std::enable_if<N1 == N>::type>
6202  CONSTCD11 string_literal(CharT c) NOEXCEPT : p_{c} {}
6203 
6204  template <std::size_t N1 = 3, class = typename std::enable_if<N1 == N>::type>
6205  CONSTCD11 string_literal(CharT c1, CharT c2) NOEXCEPT : p_{c1, c2} {}
6206 
6207  template <std::size_t N1 = 4, class = typename std::enable_if<N1 == N>::type>
6208  CONSTCD11 string_literal(CharT c1, CharT c2, CharT c3) NOEXCEPT : p_{c1, c2, c3} {}
6209 
6210  CONSTCD14 string_literal(const CharT (&a)[N]) NOEXCEPT : p_{} {
6211  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) p_[i] = a[i];
6212  }
6213 
6214  template <class U = CharT, class = typename std::enable_if<(1 < sizeof(U))>::type>
6215  CONSTCD14 string_literal(const char (&a)[N]) NOEXCEPT : p_{} {
6216  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) p_[i] = a[i];
6217  }
6218 
6219  template <class CharT2,
6220  class = typename std::enable_if<!std::is_same<CharT2, CharT>::value>::type>
6221  CONSTCD14 string_literal(string_literal<CharT2, N> const& a) NOEXCEPT : p_{} {
6222  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < N; ++i) p_[i] = a[i];
6223  }
6224 
6225  CONSTCD11 const CharT* data() const NOEXCEPT { return p_; }
6226  CONSTCD11 std::size_t size() const NOEXCEPT { return N - 1; }
6227 
6228  CONSTCD11 const_iterator begin() const NOEXCEPT { return p_; }
6229  CONSTCD11 const_iterator end() const NOEXCEPT { return p_ + N - 1; }
6230 
6231  CONSTCD11 CharT const& operator[](std::size_t n) const NOEXCEPT { return p_[n]; }
6232 
6233  template <class Traits>
6234  friend std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& operator<<(

6259 template <class CharT1, class CharT2, std::size_t N1, std::size_t N2>
6260 CONSTCD14 inline string_literal<
6261  typename std::conditional<sizeof(CharT2) <= sizeof(CharT1), CharT1, CharT2>::type,
6262  N1 + N2 - 1>
6263 operator+(const string_literal<CharT1, N1>& x,
6264  const string_literal<CharT2, N2>& y) NOEXCEPT {
6265  using CT =
6266  typename std::conditional<sizeof(CharT2) <= sizeof(CharT1), CharT1, CharT2>::type;
6267 
6268  string_literal<CT, N1 + N2 - 1> r;
6269  std::size_t i = 0;
6270  for (; i < N1 - 1; ++i) r.p_[i] = CT(x.p_[i]);
6271  for (std::size_t j = 0; j < N2; ++j, ++i) r.p_[i] = CT(y.p_[j]);
6272 
6273  return r;
6274 }

6316 template <class CharT, std::intmax_t N, std::intmax_t D>
6317 CONSTCD14 inline std::enable_if_t<
6318  std::ratio<N, D>::type::den != 1,
6319  string_literal<CharT, to_string_len(std::ratio<N, D>::type::num) +
6320  to_string_len(std::ratio<N, D>::type::den) + 4>>
6321 msl(std::ratio<N, D>) NOEXCEPT {
6322  using R = typename std::ratio<N, D>::type;
6323  return msl(CharT{'['}) + msl<R::num>() + msl(CharT{'/'}) + msl<R::den>() +
6324  msl(CharT{']'});
6325 }

6519 template <class CharT, class Traits, class Rep, class Period>
6520 inline std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& operator<<(
6521  std::basic_ostream<CharT, Traits>& os, const std::chrono::duration<Rep, Period>& d) {
6522  using namespace detail;
6523  return os << make_string<CharT, Traits>::from(d.count()) +
6524  get_units<CharT>(typename Period::type{});
